text: thopata awasi welawaka gos awasi tharam anubhawa karawa!
owunge kuda manasawal hariyata ambaannata pera thiyena mati guliyak wage.
ee asse chals dawin kiyanawa minissu wanarayangen parinamaya wuna kiyala.
kisima hithak papuwak nathuwa wage nethmigen, pitawena wachanawalata mata aawe man ganama maha wisala dukak..
mema granthaye wisheshathwaya wanne deshapalanamaya muhunuwarakin thorawa itha rasawath nawa kathawaka aakruthiyen rachana kota thibimayi.
awasana kod eka
eekayi ma muladith pawasuwe widyawe melesa kalayath samanga wenas wime swabhawaya ehi shakthiyak misa durwalakamak nowana bawa.
oya kompithar kamareta yanna issella masayak withara apith kalu lallen thama igena gaththe.
kalin gini niwana hamudawe bhatayek hatiyata sewaya kala jakub halik nam rogiya, pilika rogayata prathikara labamin sitiyadi, ohuge hrudayawasthuwa iwath karanu laba siti bawayi prakasha kale.
mulin kala amathuma wenas kala nohakiya.
menna magen mal mitak.
methek oba ha ma hamuwuye tha්rasthawadayata biyapathwu samajayaka pa්rabhakaran nam athuru muhunatha thulini.
gowi sanwidhana ekamuthuwe sabhapathi aarbi herath pawasanne mema kramayata giyoth loku lunu menma elawalu gowiyada gowithana athahara damana bawayi.
duminda salgadu pitiya jana gangakin purawayi..!
meya da wasara kihipayakata ihathadi siduwu ewani siddhiyaka helidarawwaki.
athithaye sulutharayak aandu pakshayata thibiyadi janadhipathiwaru dedenek aandu dekak path kara atha.
ithin deshapalana baladhikaraya ee sandaha unandu nowima pudumayak nowe.
bonowana roga pathirenne ayi?
awasanaye okkomala hondin husma windath, aabadha rasak daran aapu punchi pancha nisa mage hadawatha binduna.
ee kohoma wunath ma kiyanne kaka guti kela ganimin mulu jiwithayama gewima moda kamak kiya.

janapathi niyoga karayiyala jathika wanodyanaya thula paudgalika samagam wisin idikara athi siyalu sthira saha thawakalika sancharaka kandawuru wahama iwath karana lesa mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma wanajiwi departhamenthuwe adhyaksha janaralwaraya wetha niyoga karayi.
koyi thanaka hari kada bindagena yanawa.
ane dekart gana kiyanne nathiwa pahadili karanna.
athi yanthan uba me kello dennata bayayi!
ohuta miya yana wita daruwan dedenek sitiyeya.
namuth wathman rajaya eewa ekineka wikuna damamin sitima ape ratata karana barapathala aparadhayak.
imran saudiyata paminiye 18…

in pasu thilakaranna namathi sakakara thri roda ratha riyaduruge niwase adala kanthawath daruwath nathara kara athi athara dina kipayak ehi natharawa siti kanthawa thilakaranna namaththa wisin kolambaa kandawagena gos aamar widiye pihiti widesha rakiya eejansiyakin gaman balapathrayak piliyela kara di atha.

mita amathara dompe pradeshiya sabha bala pradeshayata ayath dekatana,namaluwa,malwana, kalukodayawa,dompe yana pradeshawalatath, gampaha pradeshiya sabhawata ayath ihala yagoda, pahala yagoda, piyarathna mawatha, waliweriya, rathupaswala saha biyagama aayojana kalapaya yana pradesha sandahath adala kalasimawa thula jala sapayuma athhituwana bawa jathika jala sampadana ha jalapawahana mandalaya sandahan kaleya.
deyiya bima balagaththa.
enam winynyanayada athiwana nathiwana anithya dharmathawaki.
eekabaddha wipakshaye prabalayek kalakirimen..
ee sindu rediyo eke wagema ti.wi. eke pracharaya wenakota harima aasawen asagana sitiya.
ethakota wap mangul uthsawayedi athun pita yanawa.

hindi bhashawa pilibanda aa sathu mana danimath, uththara bharathiya ragadhari sangithaya pilibanda a sathu wanna wu danumath puhunuwath me mihira uparimayen sha්rawakayanta laba denna hethuwak wuna kiyala mata wishwasayi.

kowid wasangathayen wyakulathwayata path samajaya prakruthi thaththwayata path kirime di maha sangharathnaya sathuwa wishala wagakimak athi athara, ee sandaha bhikshun wahansegen sadum lath kamituwak idiriye di path kara nisi wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka karana bawa unwahanse awadharanaya kalaha.
bhanada lekhanaya, bhanda mila, bhumi kampawa…

dushkara gammana hara boho thanwala paniya jalaya wassa nisa soyagatha haki wunath aahara drawya milata gannata aadayamak nathiwima nisa naya ugulaka hirawenawa hara an wikalpayak janathawata ithiri wi natha.
tab dila ugannanna oone iskole lamayita neweyi, aanduwe putu rath karana ihala awariye rajya sewakayanta.
sinhala bhashawen antharjala sewa laba dena subasa web adawiya -
me ekakwath na kiyanne ithin aadareth naha.”
janadhipathi gedarin genawa ‘madhya nidahasa’ saha ‘apata gahima’
karanne monawada hithaganna bari awinishchitha thanaka inne.
badaginne inna obe pawule ayata kama aragena yanna.+ 34 obe bala sahodarayawa meheta ekkagena aawoth oba oththukarayan nowa awanka minissu kiya mama piligannam.
ganna ganna epa bolalla wayasata yanakota hamoma ohoma thamayi.
he he ...
ohu lawa me chithrapataye thema githaya kiyawana lesaya.
thisdahasak ranawiruwan diwi pudala beragaththu me rata me thakkadi ralata gilaganna ida nodemu!
samata theruwan saranayi!
mama hithana widihata nam sanskruthiya anekata pawara dima thamayi adhyapanaya kiyanne.
boho wita manahara sangarawe palawune ridars dayijest ho ee aakaraye wenath inglish sangarawala palawunu lipiwala pariwarthana wiya yuthu yayi mama sithami.
obath naththalata sudanamda?
ayoniso manasikarayath muttassathiyath thibuna nam akusal jawan sith pahala weyi.
dina 16, mathara, motar ratha amathara kotas saha upanga
dan nam mage kathawa kiyanna ba…

ehidi pa්radeshaye dengu maduru kitayan bo wimata wadi ida kadak pawathina sthana pirisidu kara athara parisarayata muda harina lada plastik apadrawya gini thaba winasha kirimata sidu karana ladi.mema wadasatahana mawanalla pa්radeshiya lekam pa්riyangani pethangoda mahathmiyage pa්radhanathwayen sanwidhanaya kara thibunu athara mawanalla, kiringadeniya ka/mawa/baduriya muslim widyalayedi ye daruwanda sha්ramadana katayuthu sandaha ekwiya
mechchara kal kammali sagare pinapu mata mokak hari aluguththeru wadak karanna chans ekak hamba unama danena sanipe gananam kiyala wadak na.
warada karannata nawa dadi nithi yatathe daduwam laba dima ekama wisanduma bawa ohu prakasha kota thibe.
mehi idikirim kramaya wiyali pedareruwama wana athara, shailiya kalinga shailiya we.

ee sandaha mata samada udawkarana basnahira palath sabhawata saha aandukara alewi mawulana mahathata ha mathi amathiwaruntath, pradhana lekamthumiya athulu rajya niladharintada sthuthwantha wenawa.kalaniya wishwa widyalaye kulapathi aacharya walamitiyawe kusaladhamma anunahimi anushasanawak kala athara basnahira palath aandukara alewi mawulana mahatha palath pradhana lekam jayanthi wijethunga mahathmiyada mehidi adahas dakwuha..

thaman maha bauddhayekayi sitha sitina pujith jayasundara polispathiwaraya mehidi ratata pahadili kala yuththe nithiya ha samaya aaraksha kirimata path kara sitina polis niladharin mewani nithi wirodhi kriya as panapitama daka daka nihandawa eewata sahaya pala karana wita “ape” hamuduruwarun thora bera ganime lojik ekaya.

mage biridath math ape wiwaha uthsawaya sanwidhanaya karana wita ape pradhana aramuna unaෙ puluwan tharam adu mudalak wiyadam karala ape wiwahaya karamu kiyana eka, ithin api wedimakata awashya latta patta hama dema puluwan tharam aduwata thama baluwe, samahara ayata hithen athi mun patta lobhayi kiyalath, habayi ithin adu wiyadamin unath api hithuwatath wada ape wedima lassanata keruna ee ape chethanawe pirisidu kama nisama wenna athi.
waidya jayalath jayawardhanage akal wiyowa lankawe wargika sanhindiyawata wu balawath paduwaki.
meyin kiyawenne anagathayedi rajya palakayan adharmishta wana bawath owun adharmishta wanawita rate purawasiyanda adharmishta wana bawaya.
suprakata the apanayana samagamak wu kews samagamada wasi gos athi athara boho apahasuthawayan mada kriyathmakawu brawuns wani samagam dan yalith diyunuwi thibenawa.

nindehi muthra kirima angawana sangnyawan wani charyawa-padanam kota gath wikalpayanhi sita, homona prathisthapanaya wani osu bhawithaya ha, muthramargaya wishala kirima wani shalya chikithsaka kriyawan dakwa pawa pulul parasayaka prathikarayan me sandaha niyama wiya haka.
ooka "salli bage thiyena" neweyi "thibuna" kiyala wenas karaganna.
eksath jathika pakshaye durwalathawaya nisa meya mathu nowu athara pawathi palanaya dadi lesa thahawuru wiya.
waijayanthaya, shariputhraya, maiyimathaya wani durlabha poth mathadi pawa thibunath eewath winashayata gihin thibuna aakaraya saman pamina kala wimasimwala dith penuna ne.
eyin pasu sar wisin iganwu kisi deyak mage kan pethi walin athulata nogiya bawanam sahathikaya.
gayana es lakmali kathuwariyage 25 wana nawakathawa wana mema ga්ranthaya kuthuhalayen yuthuwa awasanaya thekma eka husmata kiyawa awasankala haki rasawath nawakathawaki.
me athara gowi nishpadanawalin wishala kotasak rajaya bharayata ganna ladde nagarawalata saha pitaratawalata yawimata ya.
wikalpa alewi kirima wenuwata, wikalpa nagitimak awashyayi
adhyapanaya paudgalikaranayata api mula sita wiruddhayi.
ee karala onna ape guruwirige iskole guru niwase wekant unama eekata aawa dennath ekkala padinchiyata.

nithyanukula rajayak peralimata kala kumanthrana siddhiya kondesi sahitha apayakata yatathkota sakakaruwaku mudaharimata niyoga samantha ileperuma nithyanukulawa theripathwu rajaya kumanthranayak magin perala damimata sudanam wuye yayi athadanguwata gena rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara siti thusitha ruwan amarajith wirakon kondesi sahitha apayakata yatath kota muda harina lesa niyoga kala kolambaa prradhana mahesthrath champa janaki rajarathna mahathmiya siddhiyata adalawa athadanguwata gena randawum niyoga matha randawa thabagena siti mejar jenaral sunil amarawansha da silwa ha senaka haripriya da silwa labana 10 da thek rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara thabana lesa eeye (6 da) niyoga kaleya.
shabdaya ikmawa giya arthayak sanjananaya kara ganimata minisata haki ya.
yako me manussaya kochchara dewal katikaralada me wichare liyala thiyenne.aduma tharame durwala koheda kiyalawath kiyapanko.
eelangata sammana laba ganna lokada saha rajatha thilinalabhin mehi paminenawa.

janapriya gi pada rachakayekuwana dilan gamage wisin liyana lada mema githaye sangithaya yowun parapure daksha sangitha adhyakshawarayeku men ma janapriya gayakayekuwana ashan pranandu wisin sidu kara atha.
mama natya karanda patan gaththa wele indala me wenakan samajaya ekama widihata thiyenne.
: ayasayak nowana se - ga .
hmmm pani rahayi neda eeth dekama ekama rahada?
ewita api akamathi karunu karana walata sahabhagi wimata sidu weyi.
anarkalige ayithikaruwanta minpasu maha ra sihinen biya wi awadiwannata oona natha.
miniya aksidant wod yawala, chandrika bankuwata gihin.
meya ullanghanaya kirima pariganaka aparadhayak lesada salakanu labe.
wasara 2050 wana wita mema pramanaya ton biliyana 12 dakwa ihala nanwenu atha.
eekayi ethana thibba awula.
disanayaka, en.pi. (shri jayawardhanapura wishwawidyalaya,gangodawila, nugegoda, 2013)
edina raya pura ma susan walapuna ya.

manawa himikam sasiyata pancha pudgala kamituwak 40 wana jagath manawa himikam sasiwarayata sahabhagi wima sandaha pasdenekuge samanwitha kamituwak nam kara thibe.ee widesha amathya thilak marapanage nayakathwayen yukthawaya.widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya niwedanaya kale janadhipathi maith... 2019-03-13 06:24:00 rajya sewaka mulika watupa salakiya yuthu lesa wadi wela rajya sewakayange watup wadiwima thulin labana wasaredi karyala karya sahayakayakuge masika mulika watupa rupiyal wisihatharadahasa dakwath hediyakage mulika watupa rupiyal thisdedahas pansiya wisipahak lesa saha lekamwarayakuge...
nawa prajathanthrawadi peramune ‘hansaya’ lakunin ohu tharaga waduneya.
"pasugiya kalaya purama sama siyalu denatama topi labuni."
manasika thathwayan ee kiyanne ahenawa, dakinawa, nathnam kenthiya, kanassalla wage dakima dhammanupassanawa.
watiya haki kiyanawata wada ‘walata ada damiya‘ hakiya.
ada wana wita owun kala ee maha boruwa heli wi atha.
oba la methana karana tharaka wala kisima prayojanayak na me prashneta pilithurak nathnam…
mejar basnayaka, ralahami, wage nam kiyanawa mata ahuna.
nikan brawun kalara ekak thiyenne..
ostreliyawa niyamitha panduwara 50 thula kadulu 9k dawi ras kala lakunu sankhyawa 376ki.
nil patata penne api kiyapu ma oya thamayi..

nithora atha powana manayen iwathata nogiya thiyunu kaduwak wan aayudhaya me wana witath surathe angili athara thadin sirawi thibune anathurak asa gatunu waha kriyathmaka wime atiyeni.ninden awadi wimata hethuwuye kendiriyak wan handak bawa yatisithehi yanthamata bondawu mathakayak wannak thibiye wuwada, husma pawa nogena mulu mahath chiththa eekagrathawayama yomu karamin sawan dunna da gemidula kohombaa gase athupathara sita igila giya bohowita wawulaku wiya haki nishachara pakshiyakuge kemen maki giya thatu salima harennata kisidu kendirillak wani shabdayak ohu desawana pathitha nowiya.kalaya kemen gewi giyeya.
eheth me piti pasa kisiyam widiyaka salasmak thibi athi bawa polisiya prakasha karayi.
janapriya nili dinakshi priyasad.
ada kiyanna hadanne api ee panthiye hitapu awurudu 2 sar kiyapu oyawage katha deka thunak.
ehi parlimenthu mantha්ri kanchana wijesekara mahatha pawasanne me sambandhayen niwaradiwa thahawaru kara gatha haki pudgalayan thideneku sitina bawayi.

sudu paha keti saya saha skiniya age hadakara sirura thawa thawath opawath karana athara, kadisara krida wilasaya wilaka rangana sudu hansa dhenuwaka sihi ganwayi.aya saniya mirsamaha bharathaye methek bihiwu ihalama shrenigatha tenis kridikawa ayayi.

ada diwurum dun amathyawarunge nama lekhanaya saha adala wishayayan meseya: 01.parisara, punarjananiya balashakthi amathya -susil premajayanth 02.thakshana, paryeshana ha paramanuka balashakthi amathya- patali champika ranawaka 03.widulibala ha balashakthi amathya - pawithra wanniaarachchi 04.khanija thel karmantha amathya - anura priyadarshana yapa 05.sini karmantha sanwardhana amathya - lakshman senewirathna 06.aayojana prawardhana amathya - lakshman yapa abewardhana 07.udbhitha udyana ha podu winoda katayuthu amathya - jayarathna herath 08.adhyapana sewa amathya - duminda disanayaka 09.wanajiwi sampath sanrakshana amathya - gamini wijith wijayamuni soyisa 10.
than deka wanenawa.
meka aththama kathawanam mama oyata suba pathanawa.
1997 wasare indala anushasaka kenek widiyata methek aa gamanmaga desa aapasu hari baladdi hithata danenne apramana sathutak...
sirikatha wadina sundara niwasaka aalokaya obeth, pawule samageth jiwitha walata sabama dinumak.apita ada dawase thiyena hondama aaranchiya ee wage niwasak obatath thana ganna puluwan.
meyin pahadili wanne thunuruwan mulika kara ganimin siyaluma shasthra pawathi bawayi.
ohu wirayeku lesa liya thabuwa da anagathaya wisin ee ithihasaya wenas karanu atha.
pahugiya dinawala iyan unnahe bokarapu sinhala githa 16 lede thawa paththakata harila, warna adawiyata hindi top 10 awilla thibuna.
dirgha kalayak thisse mowun mema jawarama sidu karamin lankawe wishala pradeshayakata mewani the kola bedahara athi bawa da anawaranaya wi thibe.
ee bawa prakasha karanne apa noweyi.
budun wandina me dathin
his deneth mage...
oya kochchara hondata me wande karanawa da, ee wunata oya eekata hariyana andumak adagena naha kiyala.
ma soya yali awith - sipa gannako ma dethol...

malala krida sanchithaya kandawuru bandiyi susil premalal 2013 dilli dakunu aasiyanu krida ulela mema wasare pawathwima thawamath awinishchitha thaththwayaka pawathina heyin mema wasare malala krida purna awadhanaya labana sapthambar masaye indiyawe chennayi hi pawathwimata niyamitha 20 wani aasiyanu shuratha jyeshta jawana ha pitiya malala krida tharagawaliya wetha yomu kirimata shri lanka malala krida sangamaya thiranaya kota atha.
kaurana yanu merata saha lokaye wyapthawa sitina yaksha gothrika wanshikayange mul namayi.
oba me dekama thibiya nohaka hethuwak natha.
pasuwa mama thiranaya kala eeka ganna.
agosthu masema sarungal arinawa .......
udu yatikuru wiya yuththe palakaya nowa palana kramayayi.
mahaththayawath balannako mewa hari wadada..man ahanne hari wadada..?"
nadu wisi kala.
bajari hatana paththare hengpis eka langinma kawiyak thibuna.
oba niyama awanka ayekunam obe namin liyanna.
me weddi ape janathawata kisima aාdharayak nealabena thathwayak thiyena ba ada pamina sitina amathyawaru dedenata beaheama sith wedanawen prakasha kara sitinawa.

pasugiya masaye, ewaka kuruwita polisiye sewaya kala danata rathnapura polisiye sewaya karana mahesh chinthaka senanayaka namathi niladhariya, thama niwasata himikam kiyamin polis balaya yoda, niwasa ha idamata athulu wannata uthsaha darana bawa kiya siti.
“ parajayan hamuwe nosaluna ape kalaye ammage kathawa “ – 42 kotasa kalpitiyata wahanayak thaniyama kawadawath elawala nathi wunata samudita hithuna me sare ehema karanna.
watina kiyana da samawita pradarshanaye thabanne natha.

naya mathama wajambaena aayathana melesa digin digatama salasmak nomathiwa naya wime awasana prathipalaya wanne ratama nayabarin miriki api jathiyak lesa balawath ratawal hamuwe nathibarikam kiyapamin pihita pathannata tharam nihina jathiyak bawata pathwimayi.
api eewa dige pana pana giye ara punchi kale kiyana kawiya; "onna babo athinniya, gal arambae sitinniya, galin galata paninniya, babuta baye duwanniya" wage.
meyata wyathireka washayen yedena nila nama athath eewa mehi dakwa naha.
me mathiwaranaye di pohattuwa, sandhanaya, nidahas pakshaya, janatha wimukthi peramuna, drawida sandhanaya tharaga kale eksath jathika pakshayata wiruddhawayi.
shri lanka guwan sewaye nawa sabhapathiwaraya washeyen ehi hitapu sabhapathi kapila chandrasena path kara thibenawa.
namuth age bahira shariraya dakabala ganimata owun age salu una damayi.
sathpurushayek nam anunge waradi penwadenawa se ma ohuge honda gathiguna da agaya kala yuthu yi.
jana samajaya ese sithanawa nam eya athimahath khedaniya iranamak langa kara dennaki.
thamun mehe aawe eekatayi
nyayaka ho widayathmaka parikalpanayaka eka akurak siduwi anek akura siduwimata ho akuru patali kriyawa siduwima nisa nyaya nitharama pambaagalak lesa bhawitha wana bawa kimata kamaththemi.
ee kathawen mageth ambaa mathakaya awadiwuna,habatama post ekak danna tharam ambaakatha apata thiyenawa neda kiyala hithuna eeka kiyewwama.
wiwahayen pasu kilinochchiye padinchiwa siti owunta palamu warata awathan wannata siduwuye 2008 sapthambarayedi ya.
iwasimen dawase katayuthuwala yediya yuthuyi.
ee hinda oyala chandayata lasthi wenna" janapathi maithri awadharanaya kaleya.
me rajkaraya kiyanne upangeyi yuampi karayek, mu methana poratok dila jawipeta chande danawa kiyala, anthimata aliyage passatama kathire gahanawa.
rusiyan hithawadi aagnyadayakayeku wana ohu sunni siriyanuwan ohuta wiruddhawa nagi siti wita owunwa amanushika lesa mardanaya kale ya.
habayi ee deshapalanaya karannawath katawath kade yannawath neweyi.
ee dewiyanta pamanak kala haki deyak wana sinhalakama hewath miniskama rakimata ya.
anthar samaja lig ragar shurathawa mahanuwara kridakayo yali ragena yathi
bahira aatopayata alankarayata purudu wunoth ehi paduwa thamatamayi.

shapi dosthara wada siddhiya - e shapi dosthara rohala kurunagala ammala polime awidin paminili keruwe eemantha randunuyi me ran puwatha palakare mul puwathak lesinuyi diwayine sath pihiya aragena kapa...
ethana nishpadanaye gunathmaka bawata wada ma salakanne wenath deyak.
badage athithaya etharamma anduruya...
aruni akka unath ee banum thambaayakatawath ganan gaththada?
yam pa්ramanayakata adiya pasupasata ganna puluwan.
me githaye padamalawata mama kamathiyi.
appochchiye mata wadata yanna parakku wenawo...
hasara ha chamila wishalaka upakaranaya magin eya wadath sodisi karana atharathura jerami siya kathawa idiriyata karagena yannata wiya.
mama nam hithanne ayiye ape satalayit anti rata palanaya karapu kale gana thama me kiyala thiyenne kiyala...
tika kalakin mage sharira kuduwa mahapolawata pathwana bawath, ragena yanne thama karaganna wu pin paw kusal akusal aadiya bawath mata amathaka wiya.
hamadamath subha wewa akke ayiye oyala dennatath wirultath wirulge enna inna nangitath mallitath..............
badu gewannange mudal api mana kalamanakarithwayen yuthuwa bhawitha karanawa.
ewani de me rata thula alewi kala hakiwa thibunada, apa wani deshiya waidyawarunta aushadha sandaha sulu pramanayakwath kansa labagatha haki kramayak thibenneda?
